channel.title: Corduroy's Meditations
channel.description: A cozy spot to sit and think :-)

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description:
Well, here we are. After a few weeks of procrastination I've finally gotten to setting up a blog. A tiny slice of the internet just for me!

I'm hoping to use this as a means of reflecting on things -- I've been so busy lately that I've almost forgotten how to think.


Some nice flowers, for testing and aromatic purposes :-)


That's all from me for today! Good night internet.


Tags: Hello-World
item.dc:creator: Josh
